<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scouring Rage](/Feats.aspx?ID=1612) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 110 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
an instinct that allows you to change your additional damage from [Rage](/Actions.aspx?ID=3) to a different damage type

**Trigger**
You Rage.

</column>

---

You emit a powerful surge of instinctual energy when you unleash your potential. Each adjacent creature takes damage equal to your level (basic Fortitude save against your class DC) of the same type as your additional damage during that Rage.
